attributes.description: We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description: At Mahindra East Rand Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. All Pre-Owned vehicles are 125 point checked, Serviced and Road Ready. We will design a package around your financial needs. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license & registration fees. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks, subject to Bank Approval. Warranty and Service plans available and all vehicles have Tracker Pre-Fitment. Trade-in’s welcome. T’s & C’s Apply.
